attributes.action: come to Ryan Roberts house and break his iPhone
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am sick to death about hearing how good Mr Roberts iphone is. Everyday he talks about it like its his first born child. Please will you arrange a visit to Manchester to crush his iPhone or just stamp on it. When you are there you can also pour a bucket of water over his head. He needs extinguishing one and for all.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
